title: Reliability and validity tests of the Chinese version of the Geriatric Locomotive Function Scale (GLFS-25) in tumor survivors
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Yu-Ling Yang, Hui-Hong Wang, Hui Su, Hui Lu, Hui Yu, Jing Wang, Yu-Qing Zhou, Ling Li, Ying Chen
